page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT IN SALTBURN
page.content: Saltburn is a dormitory town and many people have to travel to work finding employment in large industries located in Redcar and Middlesbrough. ICI and British Steel are major employers of the local communities. Very few jobs are available in Saltburn. Most are part time jobs in small offices and shops. Seasonal work is limited to the holdiay period and found mainly along the seafront. Saltburn,like many towns in Cleveland has many unemployed with the youngest being hit the hardest. This is because they lack the skills and experience needed to work in these industries.The long term outlook is poor. Cleveland has suffered from the current decline in industry and towns like Saltburn have been affected. In January 1985 unemployment totalled 621 (22.1% of the workforce). At the same time 2798 were in employment.
